SKT_FIRST.name: Surefire Headshot
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and has a <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> chance to increase the Priority Gauge of the ally with the highest Max Health by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고, <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> 확률로 최대 체력이 가장 높은 아군의 행동 게이지를 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>の確率で最大HPが最も高い味方の行動ゲージを<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>UPさせる。

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Inflicts reduced Defense on the target for 2 turns

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes to Enhanced Skill\nEnhanced Reduced Defense\n(Ignores Resilience)
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 강화 스킬로 교체\n방어력 감소 강화\n(효과 저항 무시)
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\n防御力DOWN強化\n(効果抵抗無視)

SKT_SECOND.name: Dopamine Boost
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and increases all allies' <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Effectiveness</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nAfter attacking, increases the Priority Gauge of the ally with the highest Max Health by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고, <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>명중</color>과 <color=#28d9ed>효과 적중</color>을 증가시킵니다.\n공격 후 최대 체력이 가장 높은 아군의 행동 게이지를 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>命中</color>と<color=#28d9ed>効果命中</color>をUPさせる。\n攻撃後、最大HPが最も高い味方の行動ゲージを<color=#28d9ed>20%</color> の間UPさせる。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Hidden Event
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and grants all allies <color=#28d9ed>Counterattack</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Barrier</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. Barrier Strength increases based on the target's Max Health.\nAfter attacking, reduces all of the target's <color=#28d9ed>Unique Resource</color>. (Ignores the target's Resilience and Immunity)
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고, <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>반격</color>과 <color=#28d9ed>실드</color>를 부여합니다. 실드량은 대상 최대 체력에 비례하여 증가합니다.\n공격 후 대상이 보유한 <color=#28d9ed>고유 자원</color>의 수량을 모두 감소시킵니다. (대상의 효과 저항 및 면역 무시)
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え,<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間、味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>反撃</color>と<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>を付与する。シールド量は対象の最大HPが高いほどUPする。\n攻撃後、対象が保有している<color=#28d9ed>固有資源</color>の数量をすべてDOWNさせる。(対象の効果抵抗及び免疫無視)

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, deals Fixed Damage equal to <color=#28d9ed>8%</color> of the target's Max Health.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases the Priority Gauge of the ally with the highest Max Health by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 스타터 효과</color> : 공격 후 대상에게 대상 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>8%</color> 만큼의 고정 피해를 입힙니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 최대 체력이 가장 높은 아군의 행동 게이지를 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(初手)</color>:攻撃後、対象に対象の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>8%</color>の固定ダメージを与える。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、最大HPが最も高い味方の行動ゲージを<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPさせる。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
